shortdesc.ph: Callback when the subscribed stream falls back to audio-only or recovers to audio-video.
Callback when the subscribed stream falls back to audio-only or recovers to audio and video.
Callback when the subscribed stream falls back to audio-only or recovers to audio and video.
Callback when the subscribed stream falls back to audio-only or recovers to audio-video.

p.codeblock: final void Function(int uid, bool isFallbackOrRecover)? onRemoteSubscribeFallbackToAudioOnly;
public virtual void OnRemoteSubscribeFallbackToAudioOnly(uint uid, bool isFallbackOrRecover)

section.p:
After you call and set option to StreamFallbackOptionAudioOnly, this callback is triggered in the following situations:
The subscribed audio-video stream falls back to audio-only due to poor downlink network conditions
The subscribed audio stream recovers to audio-video as the network improves

When you call and set option to StreamFallbackOptionAudioOnly, this callback is triggered in the following situations:
The downlink network condition is poor, and the subscribed audio and video stream falls back to audio-only.
The downlink network condition improves, and the subscribed audio-only stream recovers to audio and video.

After you call and set option to streamFallbackOptionAudioOnly, this callback is triggered in the following situations:
When the downlink network condition is poor, the subscribed audio and video stream falls back to audio-only
When the downlink network condition improves, the subscribed audio-only stream recovers to audio and video

After you call and set option to STREAM_FALLBACK_OPTION_AUDIO_ONLY, this callback is triggered in the following cases:
The downlink network condition is poor, and the subscribed audio-video stream falls back to audio-only.
The downlink network condition improves, and the subscribed audio stream recovers to audio-video.
section.note: When the subscribed stream falls back to a lower-quality video stream due to weak network conditions, you can monitor the switch between high and low video streams via the callback.
When the subscribed stream falls back to a lower-quality video stream due to poor network conditions, you can monitor the switch between high and low video streams through the callback.
When the subscribed stream falls back to a low-quality video stream due to poor network conditions, you can monitor the switching of remote video stream quality through the callback.
When the subscribed stream falls back to a lower-quality video stream due to poor network conditions, you can monitor the switch between remote video streams via the callback.

plentry.pd: User ID of the remote user.

ul.li: : The subscribed stream has fallen back to audio-only due to poor network conditions.
: The subscribed stream has recovered to audio-video due to improved network conditions.
: Due to poor network conditions, the subscribed stream has fallen back to audio-only.
: Due to improved network conditions, the subscribed stream has recovered to audio and video.

plentry.pd: User ID of the remote user.

ul.li: : Due to poor network conditions, the subscribed stream has fallen back to audio-only.
: Due to improved network conditions, the subscribed stream has recovered to audio and video.

plentry.pd: The user ID of the remote user.

ul.li: : The subscribed stream has fallen back to audio-only due to poor network conditions.
: The subscribed stream has recovered to audio-video due to improved network conditions.
